title: A Glimpse into My Portfolio
description1: I've had the opportunity to work on a diverse range of projects, from full-stack web applications to mobile solutions and AI-powered tools. Each project has been a unique learning experience, allowing me to hone my skills and explore new technologies.
description2: With a total of {projectsCount} projects, my portfolio showcases my dedication to creating robust, scalable, and user-friendly applications. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and build innovative solutions.
